List of projects in the TB-DURATION study:

* **igra_decay_power:** sample size calculation to estimate the rate of decay of IGRA+
in a population. [HTML](https://tb-duration.github.io/igra_decay_power/sample_size.html)
[code+data](https://github.com/TB-DURATION/igra_decay_power)

* **mice:** using experimental results in mice to work out possible short duration of
treatment in humans. [HTML](https://tb-duration.github.io/mice/analysis.html)
[code+data](https://github.com/TB-DURATION/mice)

* **tpt_model:** model exploration of short duration targeted prophylactic policy
against tuberculosis. [HTML](https://tb-duration.github.io/tpt_model/tpt_model2.html)
[code+data](https://github.com/TB-DURATION/tpt_model)
